Header: Australian High Commissioner Pays Courtesy Call on Jaffna Commander
Content: The Australian High Commissioner in Sri Lanka, HE Mr Bryce Hutchesson paid a courtesy call on Major General Darshana Hettiarrachchi, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, on Friday (7) during a tour to the North. He was accompanied by the High Commissionâ€™s First Secretary Ms Krishni Gunasena and the senior program officer Mr R Sivasuthan. The delegation discussed matters pertaining to the civil-military co-ordination projects and reconciliation process within the Jaffna Peninsula. The Commander Security Forces - Jaffna provided a comprehensive briefing on the present state of the process and presented a memento to the delegation prior to their departure.
